name: Enocta
tag_list: e-learning, distance-learning, lms, blended-learning, classroom-learning, learning-management-system
overview: Enocta is a pioneering innovative company founded in 1999 with the commitment to meet corporate e-learning needs by conjoining and managing them from a single center. Since the year 2006, Enocta has been developing comprehensive systems that administer all e-learning, training, and personal development needs of companies. With the learning management system developed by Enocta, the Enocta Learning Platform, companies can manage, besides their e-learning activities, the demand collection, planning, resource and budget management and training systems from a single point of administration. Enocta continues to serve innovative and high-quality e-learning, blended learning (classroom learning model integrated to e-learning) and learning management system solutions to its customers.

offices.address1: Profilo İş Merkezi Cemal Sahir Sokak
Enocta Ofis Binası Halıcı Yazılım Evi Giriş
